mapper.insert: insert into film(filmid , filmname , image , cateid , price , recommend , thestart , theend , hits , sellnum , contents ) values(#{filmid} , #{filmname} , #{image} , #{cateid} , #{price} , #{recommend} , #{thestart} , #{theend} , #{hits} , #{sellnum} , #{contents} )
mapper.update: update film set filmname=#{filmname} , image=#{image} , cateid=#{cateid} , price=#{price} , recommend=#{recommend} , thestart=#{thestart} , theend=#{theend} , hits=#{hits} , sellnum=#{sellnum} , contents=#{contents} where filmid=#{filmid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.catename from film a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid order by filmid desc
select a.* , b.catename from film a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by filmid desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from film a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from film a , cate b where a.cateid = b.cateid and a.cateid=#{cateid} order by hits desc limit 5
select a.* , b.catename from film a , cate b where 1=1 and a.cateid = b.cateid and filmid=#{filmid} order by filmid desc
